item.title: Learning SQL
item.description: #data #SQL What is SQL? There are 5 generic components of the SQL language: [[DDL: data definition language]], such as: Operations CREATE ALTER DROP Targets database table constraints view index [[DQL: data query language]], such as: SELECT FROM WHERE GROUP BY HAVING ORDER BY LIMIT [[DML: data manipulation language]], such as INSERT UPDATE DELETE [[DCL: data control language]], such as: GRANT REVOKE [[TCL: transaction control language]], such as: START (BEGIN) TRANSACTION COMMIT ROLLBACK There are also 3 implementation dependant components:
